description_eng: Use narratives to enhance the memory of specific items/events.
description_chin: 使用故事來觸發特定項目/事件的記憶。
study_focus: Reading and Comprehension Strategies, Memory Enhancement Techniques, Critical Thinking and Problem-Solving Approaches
beginner_suggestions_eng: Start with simple stories to remember facts.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 從簡單的故事記住事實
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Construct more complex narratives for advanced topics.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 創作更複雜的敘事來記住高級主題
advanced_suggestions_eng: Incorporate various elements of storytelling to enhance memory recall.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 結合多種故事講述元素來增強記憶回憶

description_eng: Use rhythm and sounds for recall memory, useful for auditory learners.
description_chin: 使用重複的節奏和聲音來回憶記憶。適合聽覺學習者。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques, Multisensory Learning Approaches
beginner_suggestions_eng: Use simple rhymes or rhythms.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 使用簡單的韻律或節奏
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Experiment with more complex sonic patterns.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 嘗試更複雜的聲音模式
advanced_suggestions_eng: Create own rhythmic patterns for complex subjects.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 創作自己的節奏模式來回憶較複雜的科目

description_eng: Visualize an imaginary walk, placing items to remember around the room.
description_chin: 想像一次虛構的步行，將要記住的內容放置在房間中。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques
beginner_suggestions_eng: Use simple items and fewer loci.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 使用簡單的物品和較少的記憶地點
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Increase complexity and number of loci.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 增加複雜性和記憶地點的數量
advanced_suggestions_eng: Incorporate various sensory details for each locus.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 為每個記憶地點增加多種感官刺激

description_eng: Technique based on repetition.
description_chin: 使用簡單的短語觸發更長的信息列表。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques
beginner_suggestions_eng: Repetition of simple facts.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 從簡單的短語開始
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Increase the complexity of items to be memorized.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 創作更複雜的短語和信息列表
advanced_suggestions_eng: Combine with other methods to avoid over-reliance on rote learning.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 將非智力訊息與其他方法結合使用，以提高效果

description_eng: Use a phrase to trigger memory of a longer list of information.
description_chin: 使用簡短的詞語觸發更長的信息列表。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques
beginner_suggestions_eng: Use for memorizing simple lists.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 用於記憶簡單的列表。
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Use hidden messages for more complex lists or topics.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 使用隱藏信息法來記憶更複雜的列表或主題。
advanced_suggestions_eng: Incorporate hidden messages into broader study strategies.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 將隱藏信息法納入更大的學習策略中。

description_eng: Identify key concepts and elaborate from the center. Add links to connect related concepts.
description_chin: 辨識關鍵概念，從中心概念展開並添加相關聯的概念連結。
study_focus: Visual Representation and Conceptualization Tools, Note-Taking and Organization Methods
beginner_suggestions_eng: Create diagrams with main concepts and few links.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 創建簡單的蜘蛛圖
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Include more details and connections in diagrams.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 包含更多細節和聯繫的蜘蛛圖
advanced_suggestions_eng: Create complex diagrams with multiple layers and connections.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 創建複雜的蜘蛛圖與多個層次和聯繫

description_eng: Categorize tasks or information into 'Must be done', 'Subtle signals', and 'Requires input'.
description_chin: 將任務或信息分為「必須完成」、「細微信號」和「需要輸入」三類。
study_focus: Critical Thinking and Problem-Solving Approaches
beginner_suggestions_eng: Categorize simple tasks or facts.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 分類簡單的任務或事實
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Use for complex tasks or extensive study materials.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 使用於較為複雜的任務或廣泛的學習材料
advanced_suggestions_eng: Incorporate into a larger organizational system.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 結合到更大的組織系統中

description_eng: A systematic approach to study: Read, Encode, Annotate, and Ponder.
description_chin: 一種系統化的學習方法：閱讀、提煉、註釋和思考。
study_focus: Reading and Comprehension Strategies, Note-Taking and Organization Methods
beginner_suggestions_eng: Apply REAP to simple texts or topics.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 適用於簡單的文本或主題
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Incorporate more complex materials in REAP.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 將更複雜的材料納入REAP法中
advanced_suggestions_eng: Extend the 'Ponder' stage with further research or discussion.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 擴展「思考」階段以進行更多研究或討論

description_eng: Preview, Question, Read, Summarize, and Test as a study approach.
description_chin: 預覽、提問、閱讀、概述和測試的學習方法。
study_focus: Reading and Comprehension Strategies, Critical Thinking and Problem-Solving Approaches
beginner_suggestions_eng: Apply PQRST to simple texts or topics.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 適用於簡單的文本或主題
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Incorporate more complex materials in PQRST.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 將更複雜的材料納入PQRST法中
advanced_suggestions_eng: Tailor the PQRST process to suit individual study habits.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 根據個人學習習慣調整PQRST的步驟

description_eng: Use flashcards with a question on the front and answer on the back for repetition and recall.
description_chin: 在卡片的正面寫上問題，背面寫上正確答案，反覆進行問答並核對答案。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques, Active Learning Strategies
beginner_suggestions_eng: Use flashcards for simple facts or vocab.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 創建簡單的問題和答案
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Use flashcards for more complex concepts or equations.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 創建更複雜的問題和答案
advanced_suggestions_eng: Create flashcards for self-testing and spaced repetition.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 使用問題手卡進行自我測試和間隔複習

description_eng: Use a timer to work for 25 minutes, then rest for 5 minutes. This helps maintain focus and productivity.
description_chin: 利用計時器工作25分鐘，然後休息5分鐘。有助於保持專注和提高生產力。
study_focus: Time Management and Productivity Methods
beginner_suggestions_eng: Adjust to the structure of the Pomodoro technique.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 適應番茄工作法的結構
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Estimate how many pomodoros a task will take.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 估計每個番茄工作法任務所需的時間
advanced_suggestions_eng: Adjust Pomodoro periods to optimize personal productivity.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 調整番茄工作法的時長以優化個人生產力

description_eng: Create daily to-do lists the night before. This enables an immediate productive start to the day.
description_chin: 在前一天晚上建立每日待辦事項清單，以實現即刻的高效工作。
study_focus: Time Management and Productivity Methods
beginner_suggestions_eng: Prioritize tasks and complete the most important ones.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 優先處理任務並完成最重要的任務
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Break down tasks into sub-tasks for efficient planning.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 將任務分解為子任務以進行有效的規劃
advanced_suggestions_eng: Review productivity and make adjustments based on completed tasks.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 根據已完成的任務回顧生產力並進行調整

description_eng: Recite study materials before bed and after waking up, utilizing the brain's organizing power during sleep.
description_chin: 在睡前和醒來後朗讀學習材料，利用睡眠期間大腦的整理功能。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques, Metacognition and Reflective Practices, Time Management and Productivity Methods
beginner_suggestions_eng: N/A
beginner_suggestions_chin: N/A
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Start with simple concepts or facts.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 從簡單的概念或事實開始
advanced_suggestions_eng: Incorporate more complex materials or multiple subjects.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 運用於更複雜的材料或多個科目

description_eng: Study in a clean, distraction-free environment. Location should be chosen to encourage focus.
description_chin: 在無干擾的整潔環境中學習，選擇能夠促進專注力的地點。
study_focus: Study Environment Preparation, Time Management and Productivity Methods
beginner_suggestions_eng: Remove clear distractions from the study area.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 清除學習區域中明顯的干擾因素
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Set specific study hours during the day.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 設定每天的特定學習時間
advanced_suggestions_eng: Experiment with different environments to optimize focus and productivity.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 嘗試不同的環境以最佳化專注力和生產力

description_eng: Maintain a balanced diet to ensure energy and focus. Avoid excessive carbohydrates to prevent energy crashes.
description_chin: 保持均衡飲食，確保有足夠的能量和專注力。避免過多攝入碳水化合物，以防止能量崩潰。
study_focus: Study Environment Preparation
beginner_suggestions_eng: Understand the importance of a balanced diet.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 了解均衡飲食的重要性
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Plan meals around study schedule.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 根據學習時間表安排膳食
advanced_suggestions_eng: Experiment with different diet types to find what works best for productivity.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 嘗試不同的飲食類型，找出最適合提高生產力的方法

description_eng: Memorize one page of notes as one image. This method is effective for visual learners.
description_chin: 以圖像形式記憶一頁的筆記。這對視覺學習者特別有效。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques, Visual Representation and Conceptualization Tools
beginner_suggestions_eng: N/A
beginner_suggestions_chin: N/A
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Start with simple diagrams and images.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 從簡單的圖表和圖像開始
advanced_suggestions_eng: Experiment with more complex images, diagrams, or infographics.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 嘗試更複雜的圖像、圖表或信息圖

name_eng: How to tidy up your notes/past papers/resources
name_chin: 整理筆記/歷届試題/資料
description_eng: Organize resources by sources, subjects, and topics for quick access during revision.
description_chin: 將資源按來源（學校/補習班）分類，再按科目和主題進行整理，以便在復習時快速找到所需資源。
study_focus: Note-Taking and Organization Methods, Study Environment Preparation
beginner_suggestions_eng: Organize simple resources and notes.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 將簡單的資源和筆記進行整理。
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Develop a more detailed organization system.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 開發更詳細的組織系統。
advanced_suggestions_eng: Continuously review and adapt the system as necessary.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 持續審查和調整系統以適應需要。

description_eng: Use diagrams to help learn and understand concepts. It provides a visual representation to aid memory.
description_chin: 使用圖表幫助學習和理解概念。它提供了視覺化的表達方式，有助於記憶。
study_focus: Visual Representation and Conceptualization Tools, Note-Taking and Organization Methods
beginner_suggestions_eng: Learn to draw simple diagrams.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 學習繪製簡單的圖表
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Learn to interpret complex diagrams.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 學習解讀複雜的圖表
advanced_suggestions_eng: Create own diagrams to illustrate complex concepts.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 創建自己的圖表以說明複雜的概念

description_eng: Cover a page in sticky notes with relevant information, then incorporate these into your notes.
description_chin: 用便利貼覆蓋一頁的內容，然後將其融入筆記中。
study_focus: Note-Taking and Organization Methods, Memory Enhancement Techniques
beginner_suggestions_eng: N/A
beginner_suggestions_chin: N/A
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Start with using sticky notes for main points.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 使用便利貼記錄主要觀點
advanced_suggestions_eng: Use sticky notes to add supplementary information, questions, or insights.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 使用便利貼添加補充信息、問題或見解

description_eng: Summarize notes into main points with examples. It provides an overview and quick revision method.
description_chin: 將筆記縮寫為主要觀點和示例。提供一個概述和快速複習的方法。
study_focus: Note-Taking and Organization Methods
beginner_suggestions_eng: Summarize main points from texts.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 從文本中摘錄主要觀點
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Include examples to support points.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 為每個觀點提供至少一個例子
advanced_suggestions_eng: Use summary notes for active recall practice.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 將摘要筆記用於主動回憶練習

description_eng: Practice past paper questions for each topic after revision and track progress.
description_chin: 在復習每個主題後進行過去試題練習並追踪進度。
study_focus: Active Learning Strategies
beginner_suggestions_eng: Practice past questions after learning each topic.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 在學習每個主題後進行過去試題練習
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Review and understand mistakes made in past questions.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 詳細了解並修正錯誤答案
advanced_suggestions_eng: Analyze patterns in mistakes and address them.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 分析錯誤模式並加以處理

description_eng: Review new concepts at increasing intervals. This aids long-term memory retention.
description_chin: 在遞增的間隔中複習新概念。有助於長期記憶保持。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques, Active Learning Strategies
beginner_suggestions_eng: Practice this method with simple facts.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 適應簡單事實的間隔複習
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Incorporate complex concepts in the practice.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 將複雜概念納入複習中
advanced_suggestions_eng: Experiment with the length of intervals for optimal learning.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 根據個人學習習慣調整間隔時長

description_eng: Actively recall content before reviewing it at spaced intervals. Helps identify weak areas.
description_chin: 在進行間隔複習之前，主動回憶內容。有助於識別薄弱領域。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques, Active Learning Strategies
beginner_suggestions_eng: Start with recalling simple facts.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 從簡單事實開始主動回憶
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Incorporate complex concepts in the practice.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 在複習中納入較複雜的概念
advanced_suggestions_eng: Review performance trends and adjust study strategies accordingly.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 檢視績效趨勢並根據需要調整學習策略

description_eng: Use TEAPCALIM acronym to analyze texts. It aids in understanding and interpreting texts.
description_chin: 使用TEAPCALIM縮寫來分析文本。有助於理解和解讀文本。
study_focus: Critical Thinking and Problem-Solving Approaches
beginner_suggestions_eng: N/A
beginner_suggestions_chin: N/A
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Start with analyzing simpler texts.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 從分析簡單文本開始
advanced_suggestions_eng: Analyze complex texts and extract deeper meanings.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 分析複雜文本並提取更深層含義

description_eng: Store useful vocab for language learning. It aids in expanding vocabulary.
description_chin: 儲存有用的單詞，以擴大詞彙量。
study_focus: Reading and Comprehension Strategies, Memory Enhancement Techniques
beginner_suggestions_eng: Store new words and their meanings.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 儲存新單詞及其意思
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Add synonyms and category tags.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 添加同義詞和分類標籤
advanced_suggestions_eng: Include sample sentences and related topics.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 包含例句和相關主題

description_eng: Keep track of questions you got wrong in past papers, understand why and correct them.
description_chin: 記錄在過去試卷中回答錯誤的問題，理解錯誤的原因並進行糾正。
study_focus: Note-Taking and Organization Methods, Memory Enhancement Techniques
beginner_suggestions_eng: Keep a record of incorrect answers.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 記錄答錯的問題
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Understand the mistakes and correct answers.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 理解錯誤和正確的解答方法
advanced_suggestions_eng: Review trends in mistakes and address them.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 回顧錯誤模式並進行修正

description_eng: Use a whiteboard to write and recall something you want to remember.
description_chin: 使用白板寫下要記住的內容，盡量用最少的字數，然後回憶已寫下的內容。
study_focus: Memory Enhancement Techniques
beginner_suggestions_eng: Write simple facts or concepts and recall them.
beginner_suggestions_chin: 寫下簡單事實或概念並回憶
intermediate_suggestions_eng: Include more complex concepts or facts.
intermediate_suggestions_chin: 包含更複雜的概念或事實
advanced_suggestions_eng: Use this method for group study and discussion.
advanced_suggestions_chin: 用於團體學習和討論
